rotate_door_clockwise.description: Rotate the door clockwise to make some adjustments.

rotate_door.description: Rotate the door to adjust its position.

clean_rotation_door.description: Clean the rotation door to ensure it is free of dust or debris.

slide_drawer_in_half.description: Slide the opened drawer in halfway.

clean_drawer_sides.description: Clean the sides of the opened drawer.

drawer_maintenance.description: Slide the drawer in and out for maintenance check.

slide_drawer_in.description: Slide the opened drawer in, closing it.

clean_inside_drawer.description: Clean the inside of the opened drawer.

open_close_drawer.description: Slide the drawer in and out.

press_drawer.description: Press the bottom of the drawer.

close_drawer.description: Push the drawer inwards to close it.

pull_out_drawer_half.description: Pull out the closed drawer halfway to open it partially.

closed_drawer_operation.description: Slide the drawer in and out to test the functionality of the closed drawer.

pull_out_drawer.description: Pull out the closed drawer, opening it.

drawer_status_check.description: The drawer is closed, no operation needed.

open_close_drawer.description: Slide the drawer in and out

open_drawer.description: Pull the drawer outwards to open it.

wipe_furniture_sides.description: Wipe the sides of the furniture body to remove any dust.

clean_furniture_back.description: Clean the back of the furniture body.

wipe_furniture_surface.description: Wipe the surface of the furniture body to remove any dust.

full_clean_furniture.description: Clean the whole furniture body thoroughly.

clean_furniture_body_thoroughly.description: Thoroughly clean the furniture body to maintain hygiene.

clean_furniture_body.description: Clean the furniture body to keep it neat and tidy.

clean_overall.description: Clean the entire furniture, including the door, drawer, and furniture body, twice.

adjust_door_and_clean.description: Rotate the door for adjustment after cleaning all the parts of the furniture.

clean_all_parts.description: Clean all the parts of the furniture including the door, drawer and furniture body.

repeat_cleaning.description: Repeatedly clean the piece of furniture to ensure all parts are dust-free.

clean_whole_furniture.description: Clean the entire furniture, including the furniture body, drawer, and rotation door.
